vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ζαβουλών, ὁ indecl. (Heb. זְבוּלוּן see Gen.30:20)
Zebulun, Jacob's tenth son: the tribe of Z., Mat.4:13, 15, Rev.7:8.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Zebulun living at the time of the Patriarchs, first mentioned at Gen.30.20;
son of: Israel (H3478) and Leah (H3812);
brother of: Reuben (H7205), Simeon (H8095), Levi (H3878), Judah (H3063), Issachar (H3485) and Dinah (H1783);
half-brother of: Dan (H1835H), Naphtali (H5321), Gad (H1410), Asher (H0836), Joseph (H3130) and Benjamin (H1144);
father of: Sered (H5624), Elon (H0356H) and Jahleel (H3177)
§ Zebulun, "honor"
Zebulun, (Proper name), indeclinable, an Israelite tribe, Mt. 4:13, 15; Rev. 7:8*
vocabInfos._es_Definition: Zabulón: (1) tribu israelita ; (2) y su territorio
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
西布倫 这个陽性專有名詞'在希伯來文的意思是 居所
1) 雅各的第十代子孫
2) 西布倫族 (太 4:13, 4:15; 啟 7:8)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
西布伦这个阳性专有名词'在希伯来文的意思是居所
1) 雅各的第十代子孙
2) 西布伦族(太4:13, 4:15;启7:8)
vocabInfos._vi_Definition: Xê-bu-lun ; Sa-bu-lôn « một chỗ ở » Xem H2074
